actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 11).

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: The frog swallows a Small or smaller target it is grappling. While swallowed, the target isn't Grappled but has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, and it has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog. While swallowing the target, the frog can't use Bite, and if the frog dies, the swallowed target is no longer Restrained and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting with the Prone condition. At the end of the frog's next turn, the swallowed target takes 5 (2d4) Acid damage. If that damage doesn't kill it, the frog disgorges it, causing it to exit Prone.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.description: The octopus can breathe only underwater. It can hold its breath for 1 hour outside water.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) from all eight tentacles. While Grappled, the target has the Restrained condition.

reactions.name: Ink Cloud
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The octopus takes damage while underwater. *Response:* The octopus releases ink that fills a 10-foot Cube centered on itself, and the octopus moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is Heavily Obscured for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and it knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Web
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 13, one creature the spider can see within 60 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Restrained condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage).

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The toad can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.description: The toad's Long Jump is up to 20 feet and its High Jump is up to 10 feet with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 12).

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: The toad swallows a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. While swallowed, the target isn't Grappled but has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, and it has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad. In addition, the target takes 10 (3d6) Acid damage at the end of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time, and it can't use Bite while it has a swallowed target. If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer Restrained and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting with the Prone condition.

traits.name: Pack Tactics

traits.name: Running Leap
traits.description: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can Long Jump up to 25 feet.

Until the grapple ends, the target takes 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage at the end of each of its turns.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny snake. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing damage-or 6 (1d4 + 4) Piercing damage if the swarm is Bloodied-plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ankylosaurus makes two Tail attacks.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The scorpion makes two Claw attacks and one Sting attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) from one of two claws.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) Poison damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The whale can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 21 (5d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The archelon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The archelon makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 14 (3d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elephant makes two Gore attacks.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d8 + 6) Piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature and the elephant moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target has the Prone condition.

bonusActions.name: Trample
bonusActions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature within 5 feet that has the Prone condition. Failure: 17 (2d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. Success: Half damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The hippopotamus can hold its breath for 10 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hippopotamus makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 16 (2d10 + 5) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The axe beak makes one Sharpened Beak attack and one Talons attack.
multiattackActions: axe beak makes one Sharpened Beak

actions.name: Sharpened Beak
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 18 (2d12 + 5) Slashing damage, and a creature within 5 feet of the target (axe beak's choice) takes 6 (1d12) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d8 + 5) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the *Prone* condition.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The crocodile can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The crocodile makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 21 (3d10 + 5) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 15). While Grappled, the target has the Restrained condition and can't be targeted by the crocodile's Tail.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 18 (3d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.description: The shark can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The shark makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9 (with Advantage if the target doesn't have all its Hit Points), reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 22 (3d10 + 6) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The triceratops makes two Gore attacks.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 19 (2d12 + 6) Piercing damage. If the target is Huge or smaller and the triceratops moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) Piercing damage and has the Prone condition.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.description: The squid can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The squid makes one Bite attack and one Tentacle attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 28 (4d10 + 6) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 19 (3d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 16) from one of two tentacles, and the squid can pull the target up to 10 feet straight toward itself.

reactions.name: Ink Cloud
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The squid takes damage while underwater. *Response:* The squid releases ink that fills a 15-foot Cube centered on itself, and the squid moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is Heavily Obscured for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The mammoth makes two Gore attacks.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 18 (2d10 + 7) Piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature and the mammoth moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target has the Prone condition.

bonusActions.name: Trample
bonusActions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 18, one creature within 5 feet that has the Prone condition. Failure: 29 (4d10 + 7) Bludgeoning damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ape makes two Fist attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 22 (3d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Boulder Toss
actions.description: The ape hurls a boulder at a point it can see within 90 feet. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 5-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point. *Failure:* 24 (7d6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition. *Success:* Half damage only.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The ape jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The tyrannosaurus makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 33 (4d12 + 7) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 17). While Grappled, the target has the Restrained condition and can't be targeted by the tyrannosaurus's Tail.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 25 (4d8 + 7) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.
